com.doinglab.foodlens.sdk

Interface NetworkService


  • public interface NetworkService
    Network service provides high level functions for communicating with FoodLens server.

    • Method Detail

      • predictMultipleFood

        void predictMultipleFood(byte[] foodImage,
                         RecognizeResultHandler resultHandler)
        Predict multiple foods from byte array. Byte array should contain selectFood image.

        ---- NOTE ----
        Prediction method does not support multi thread environment.
        DO NOT DUPLICATE CALL until previous call will be returned.
        Parameters:
        foodImage - - byte array that containing selectFood image.
        resultHandler - - Prediction result will be delivered in this handler.

      • predictMultipleFood

        void predictMultipleFood(android.graphics.Bitmap foodImage,
                         RecognizeResultHandler resultHandler)
        Recognize multiple foods from Bitmap. Bitmap should indicate selectFood image files.

        ---- NOTE ----
        Prediction method does not support multi thread environment.
        DO NOT DUPLICATE CALL until previous call will be returned.
        Parameters:
        foodImage - - file path that indicating selectFood image.
        resultHandler - - Prediction result will be delivered in this handler.

      • getNutritionInfo

        void getNutritionInfo(int foodId,
                      NutritionResultHandler nutritionResultHandler)
        Get nutrition information by selectFood ID
        Parameters:
        foodId - - file path that indicating selectFood image.
        nutritionResultHandler - - Nutrition information will be delivered in this handler.

      • searchFoodsByName

        void searchFoodsByName(java.lang.String foodName,
                       SearchResultHandler searchResultHandler)
        Search foods by name (It is same as auto complete function)
        Parameters:
        foodName - - Food name which will be searched.
        searchResultHandler - - Result handler for selectFood name search.

      • isSaveOriginalImage

        Get option value for save original image

        Option value

        Parameters:

      • setNutritionRetrieveMode

        void setNutritionRetrieveMode(NutritionRetrieveMode nutritionRetrieveMode)

        Parameters:
        nutritionRetrieveMode -
